About

The City Council is the legislative body that governs the City. As set by the City Charter, the City Council is comprised of the Mayor and five Councilmembers which are elected at-large representing the city as a whole.  Councilmembers are elected every four years, in even-numbered years. The Palmview City Council is committed to making Palmview a great place to Live, Work, and Raise a Family.

Mission

To be accountable by providing professional responsive services in an efficient manner to all members of our community.

Vision statement

A Small Town with a BIG heart.  Palmview TX a desirable place to work, play, and retire, A community where families establish roots, businesses thrive and opportunities are fostered for current and future generations.
